channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Four flight attendants who were onboard Alaska Airlines Flight 1282, where the door plug blew out in January 2024, are now suing Boeing.

item.title: Stocks close lower after Trump's new tariffs, weak jobs report
item.description: A jobs report on Friday showed a major slowdown of hiring in recent months.

item.title: Night vision goggles may have hampered helicopter pilots before crash with jet, experts tell NTSB
4 dead in shooting at Montana bar, suspect at large: Highway patrol
item.description: Four people were killed in a shooting at a bar in Anaconda in western Montana, according to the Montana Highway Patrol.

item.title: 4 killed in Montana shooting; authorities searching for suspect
item.description: Authorities said the suspect in a shooting in Anaconda, Montana, was believed to be armed and dangerous.
